meanings.definition: People who are not members of a group or organization.
meanings.sent1: The club welcomed new nonmembers to join their activities.
meanings.sent2: The nonmembers sat separately from the members during the meeting.
meanings.sent3: The nonmembers joked about starting their own exclusive club.
meanings.sent4: In the sea of members, the nonmembers stood out like bright stars.
meanings.sent5: The nonmembers observed the group dynamics from a different perspective.

meanings.definition: Things that are not part of a larger group or collection.
meanings.sent1: The nonmembers of the puzzle were scattered on the table.
meanings.sent2: The nonmembers of the set were placed in a separate box.
meanings.sent3: The nonmembers of the collection seemed to be hiding in plain sight.
meanings.sent4: Each nonmember of the team played a crucial role in the project.
meanings.sent5: The nonmembers of the group were carefully stored in a different cabinet.
